personal.name: Dave Vasu
personal.title: Blockchain, AI, Full Stack Developer
personal.bio: I architect intelligent solutions at the intersection of AI and full-stack development. From building accessibility-first applications to automating complex workflows, I transform ideas into impactful digital experiences.
personal.closingBio: Let’s team up and build something awesome! Always open to cool projects and new ideas.
story: As a skilled and passionate software developer for over 9 years of experience in Software(Web and App) development on front-end and backend sides, I have a solid experience in back end development including Rust Smart Contract part. I have been involved in software development since 2014, thanks to which knows what it takes to come up with effective solutions to complex problems. I believe that great results come from a product of great passion and my positive attitude and of proactive approach help me deliver these results in a very natural way.

experience.title: Solana and Ethereum Developer
experience.description: ChainSwap is recognized as a trusted, private, and secure platform for multichain and privacy swaps.
achievements: Embrace interoperability and unlock the full potential of DeFi with ChainSwap's Cross Chain Swap utilizing Chainlink’s CCIP and Circle’s CCTP to trade any token effortlessly between various leading blockchains, all within a single platform
ChainSwap prioritizes user efficiency by incorporating technology built upon next-generation infrastructure into our Telegram Bot.
Unlike traditional swaps that leave visibility to all, ChainSwap utilizes advanced techniques to ensure Privacy and complete anonymity throughout the entire Swap process.

Ditch the limitations of single-chain DEXs. ChainSwap shatters the walls, allowing you to trade tokens, protocols, and manage liquidity freely across multiple blockchains for unparalleled access and opportunity.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Deployed pods and services in Kubernetes clusters with L7 load balancing. Developed prototypes showcasing SingleStore as vector store utilizing RAG with Langchain.
achievements: Designed Logic apps for application secrets expiry notification
Managed cloud infrastructure and container orchestration

experience.title: Project Intern
experience.description: Developed innovative Faceless Recruitment System featuring bias-free hiring through anonymous candidate evaluation. Built full-stack application with secure authentication and automated screening workflows. Led intern team through complete development cycle and pitched solution to HR leadership.
achievements: Built complete recruitment platform with Azure MySQL Database and Nodejs Backend
Deployed application using Heroku and Docker
Led cross-functional team of interns to project success

projects.title: Copy trading bot
projects.subtitle: Crypto Copy Trading Tool for Solana (SOL)
projects.description: A copy trading bot on Solana automatically tracks and mimics the trades of a specific trader's wallet.
projects.longDescription: A copy trading bot on Solana automatically tracks and mimics the trades of a specific trader's wallet. It monitors the trader's transactions (like buying or selling tokens) and automatically executes the same actions in your wallet in real-time. The bot allows you to follow experienced traders without manually managing trades, copying their buys and sells on the Solana blockchain.

projects.longDescription: FLORK is a meme coin based on the Solana blockchain, inspired by the popular webcomic 'Flork of Cows'. FLORK is not only an interesting cryptocurrency project, but also provides users with a stress-free investment environment through its fee-free, tax-free policy, and community-driven growth model.

projects.longDescription: A Solana volume bot is an automated program that generates synthetic trading activity on Solana-based decentralized exchanges (DEXs) to artificially increase a token's trading volume and chart visibility.
